COAL.Description: Increases minion speed by 5% for 30 minutes

COAL_BLOCK.Description: Increases minion speed by 5% for 5 hours

ENCHANTED_COAL.Description: Increases minion speed by 10% for 24 hours

ENCHANTED_CHARCOAL.Description: Increases minion speed by 20% for 36 hours

HAMSTER_WHEEL.Description: Increases minion speed by 50% for 24 hours

FOUL_FLESH.Description: Increases minion speed by 90% for 5 hours

ENCHANTED_BREAD.Description: Increases minion speed by 5% for 12 hours

CATALYST.Description: Increases minion output by 3x for 3 hours

HYPER_CATALYST.Description: Increases minion output by 4x for 6 hours

CHEESE_FUEL.Description: Increases minion output by x2 for 1 hour
